description:
Here at Cellino Law in New York, New York, we are devoted to helping you find the justice you deserve after an accident or some other act of negligence that has left you or a family member seriously injured or worse. Our law firm's attorneys possess the extensive experience and resources necessary to handle your personal injury or wrongful death claim efficiently, and we have achieved remarkable success helping clients throughout the state who suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to any of the following:

• Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
• Slip-and-fall accidents and other premises liability issues
• Workplace and construction accidents
• Defective products
• Medical malpractice
• Dangerous drugs
• Other preventable tragedies

Regarded as one of New York's premier personal injury law firms, we have recovered an astounding amount of compensation for our plaintiff clients - more than $2 billion in settlements to date. This includes numerous multimillion-dollar awards, and we have earned memberships in the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forums as the result of our success.

As further evidence of the success we have achieved, our attorneys have received consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America and AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell along with many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers. Perhaps more importantly, we have also received a great number of testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients who praise us for our compassion and integrity as well as our aggressive approach at helping them secure the full amount of finances they need.

Although we can make no guarantees regarding your case, we can promise to do all we can to improve the likelihood you will obtain the maximum amount of compensation possible. To begin the process, you can contact Cellino Law to schedule a free initial consultation. Our law firm has five total law offices throughout New York for your convenience, and we offer virtual consultations to help ensure your health and safety.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary.

Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.

Best Lawyers® and The Best Lawyers in America© are registered trademarks of BL Rankings, LLC d/b/a Best Lawyers and Co., LLC. The names, logo, and database are protected under the trademark, copyright, and fair use laws of the United States of America.
